text: Prince Muhammad bin Talal (2 October 1940عيد ميلاد الأمير محمد بن طلال غدا الاحد، وكالة الأنباء الأردنية بترا، دخل في 7 أبريل 2012 – 29 April 2021), was the younger brother of the late King of Jordan Al Hussein bin Talal and uncle of King Abdullah II. He served as Crown Prince and was the personal representative of the King of Jordan. Prince Muhammad was a member of the ruling Hashemite family in Jordan. His father was King Talal bin Abdullah, the second king of the Hashemite Kingdom of Jordan, and his mother was Queen Zain Al Sharaf. == References == Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:People from Amman Category:Generals
title: Prince Muhammad bin Talal
